TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit VirtualPathProvider extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public MustInherit Class VirtualPathProvider Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class VirtualPathProvider abstract : MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 提供了一组方法，使 Web 应用程序可以从虚拟文件系统中检索资源。

span.span: Provides a set of methods that enable a Web application to retrieve resources from a virtual file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一组用于实现的 Web 应用程序的虚拟文件系统的方法。The class provides a set of methods for implementing a virtual file system for a Web application. 在虚拟文件系统中，由服务器的操作系统提供的文件系统之外的数据存储管理的文件和目录。In a virtual file system, the files and directories are managed by a data store other than the file system provided by the server's operating system. 例如，可以使用的虚拟文件系统来存储 SQL Server 数据库中的内容。For example, you can use a virtual file system to store content in a SQL Server database. 虚拟文件系统中，可以请求存储处理任何文件。You can store any file that is processed on request in a virtual file system. 这包括：This includes: - ASP.NET 页、 母版页、 用户控件和其他对象。ASP.NET pages, master pages, user controls, and other objects. - 使用扩展，如.htm 和.jpg 标准的网页。Standard Web pages with extensions such as .htm and .jpg. - 任何自定义扩展映射到实例。Any custom extension mapped to a instance. - 在任何命名的主题`App_Theme`文件夹。Any named theme in the `App_Theme` folder. 不能存储 ASP.NET 应用程序文件夹或虚拟文件系统中生成应用程序级别的程序集的文件。You cannot store ASP.NET application folders or files that generate application-level assemblies in a virtual file system. 这包括：This includes: - Global.asax 文件中。The Global.asax file. - Web.config 文件。Web.config files. - 站点地图数据文件使用。Site map data files used by the . - 目录包含应用程序程序集或生成应用程序程序集： `Bin`， `App_Code`， `App_GlobalResources`，则所有`App_LocalResources`。Directories that contain application assemblies or that generate application assemblies: `Bin`, `App_Code`, `App_GlobalResources`, any `App_LocalResources`. - 应用程序数据文件夹， `App_Data`。The application data folder, `App_Data`. > [!NOTE] > 如果部署的预编译网站上，提供内容实例未编译，并且不实例使用的预编译站点。If a Web site is precompiled for deployment, content provided by a instance is not compiled, and no instances are used by the precompiled site. ## 注册 VirtualPathProviderRegistering a VirtualPathProvider 自定义实例应使用注册 ASP.NET 编译系统方法之前由 Web 应用程序执行的任何页面分析或编译。A custom instance should be registered with the ASP.NET compilation system by using the method before any page parsing or compilation is performed by the Web application. 通常情况下，实例中注册`AppInitialize`中定义的方法`App_Code`目录中，或在`Application_Start`中的事件`Global.asax`文件。Typically, a instance is registered in an `AppInitialize` method defined in the `App_Code` directory, or during the `Application_Start` event in the `Global.asax` file. 有关注册的示例实例中`AppInitialize`方法，请参阅示例部分。For an example of registering a instance in an `AppInitialize` method, see the Example section. 可以注册在其他事件，但页的实例时编译并缓存之前已注册实例仍然有效，即使新实例现在将提供的源以前已编译的页。You can register a instance during other events, but pages compiled and cached before the instance is registered will not be invalidated, even if the new instance would now provide the source for the previously compiled page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是类实现，用于创建使用存储在中信息的虚拟文件系统对象。The following code example is a class implementation that creates a virtual file system using information stored in a object. 代码示例适用于的代码示例并类来提供虚拟资源从数据存储区加载到对象。The code example works with the code examples for the and classes to provide virtual resources from a data store that is loaded into a object. 此示例中有四个部分：类的实现、 XML 数据文件用于填充对象，`AppStart`对象，其中包含`AppInitialize`方法用来注册编译类系统，并提供指向虚拟文件的 ASP.NET 页。This example has four parts: the class implementation, an XML data file used to populate the object, an `AppStart` object that contains an `AppInitialize` method used to register the class with the compilation system, and an ASP.NET page that provides links to the virtual files. 若要在应用程序中使用此代码示例，请按照下列步骤。To use this sample code in an application, follow these steps. 1. 在 Web 服务器上创建示例应用程序。Create a sample application on your Web server. 2. 复制自定义的源代码到文件中应用程序的对象 （见下文）`App_Code`目录。Copy the source code for the custom object (see below) into a file in the application's `App_Code` directory. 3. 复制自定义的源代码对象 (请参阅中的示例部分类的概述主题) 到文件中应用程序的`App_Code`目录。Copy the source code for the custom object (see the Example section in the class overview topic) into a file in the application's `App_Code` directory. 4. 复制自定义的源代码对象 (请参阅中的示例部分类的概述主题) 到文件中应用程序的`App_Code`目录。Copy the source code for the custom object (see the Example section in the class overview topic) into a file in the application's `App_Code` directory. 5. 将复制的源代码`AppStart`到文件中应用程序的对象 （见下文）`App_Code`目录。Copy the source code for the `AppStart` object (see below) into a file in the application's `App_Code` directory. 6. 将 XML 数据 （见下文） 复制到名为的文件`XMLData.xml`到文件中应用程序的`App_Data`目录。Copy the XML data (see below) into a file named `XMLData.xml` into a file in the application's `App_Data` directory. 7. 复制`default.aspx`到示例应用程序的根目录的文件 （见下文）。Copy the `default.aspx` file (see below) into the root directory of the sample application. 使用 Web 浏览器打开`default.aspx`文件，，然后单击以查看虚拟文件的内容页上的链接。Use a Web browser to open the `default.aspx` file, and then click the links on the page to see the contents of the virtual files. 第一个示例是一个自定义类。The first example is a custom class. 和方法重写以指示请求的目录是否存在于虚拟文件系统。The and methods are overridden to indicate whether a requested directory is present in the virtual file system. 并方法重写以返回自定义和实例包含从虚拟文件系统的信息。The and methods are overridden to return custom and instances containing information from the virtual file system. 类还提供了`GetVirtualData`方法，由并类以访问对象，其中包含虚拟文件系统数据。The class also provides a `GetVirtualData` method used by the and classes to access the object containing the virtual file system data. 在生产环境实现中，通常将负责与数据存储进行交互的业务对象中实现此方法。In a production implementation, this method would typically be implemented in a business object responsible for interacting with the data store. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SamplePathProvider.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SamplePathProvider.vb#20)] 第二个示例是用来填充 XML 数据文件返回由自定义对象对象。The second example is the XML data file used to populate the object returned by the custom object. 此 XML 数据用于演示如何使用， ，和对象从外部数据中检索数据，并不旨在表示生产质量的数据存储区。This XML data is used to demonstrate using the , , and objects to retrieve data from external data and is not intended to represent a production-quality data store. ``` ``` 第三个示例提供了`AppStart`对象，其中包含`AppInitialize`方法。The third example provides an `AppStart` object that contains an `AppInitialize` method. 在执行任何所需的自定义初始化的 ASP.NET 应用程序初始化期间调用此方法。This method is called during the initialization of an ASP.NET application to perform any custom initialization required. 在这种情况下，它会注册自定义对象使用 ASP.NET 生成系统。In this case, it registers the custom object with the ASP.NET build system. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/AppStart.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/AppStart.vb#10)] 最后一个示例是一个包含虚拟文件系统中包含的虚拟文件的链接的 ASP.NET 页面。The last example is an ASP.NET page that contains links to the virtual files contained in the virtual file system. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

span.para:
继承自，必须重写以下成员:-
- 如果您的自定义类支持在虚拟文件系统中的目录，必须重写以下成员。 -
-
虚拟文件系统将包含 Web 站点的主题 (通过创建一个虚拟App_Themes目录)，您的自定义类必须支持的目录。 自定义类适用于类派生自和类。应实现这些类型以提供从虚拟文件系统的文件和目录信息从派生的类。有关自定义的示例实现中，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。有关自定义的示例实现中，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。

When you inherit from , you must override the following members: -
- If your custom class supports directories in the virtual file system, you must override the following members. -
-
If your virtual file system will contain themes for the Web site (by creating a virtual App_Themes directory), your custom class must support directories. A custom class works with classes derived from the and classes. You should implement derived classes from these types to provide file and directory information from your virtual file system. For an example of a custom implementation, see the Example section of the class overview topic. For an example of a custom implementation, see the Example section of the class overview topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写时构造函数，延迟必须出现在任何初始化对象已注册到方法。When overriding the constructor, defer any initialization that must occur after the object is registered to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是实现初始化自定义的构造函数类。The following code example is an implementation of the constructor that initializes a custom class. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. span.span: The base path for the application.

param.name: relativePath
param.span: 虚拟资源相对于基路径的路径。

span.span: The path to the virtual resource, relative to the base path.

summary.span: 将基路径与相对路径组合，以返回某虚拟资源的完整路径。

span.span: Combines a base path with a relative path to return a complete path to a virtual resource.
The complete path to a virtual resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来检查虚拟资源的相对路径的内容并执行所需的任何修改。Use the method to inspect the contents of a relative path to a virtual resource and perform any modifications required. 默认实现将合并`basePath`和`relativePath`根据标准 ASP.NET 路径处理和参数。The default implementation combines the `basePath` and `relativePath` parameters according to standard ASP.NET path processing.

span.para: 如果重写的默认实现方法中，将要求你将使用任何特殊语法到有效的虚拟路径的参数。你负责语法检查路径验证和处理不正确的输入，以及为格式正确的输入的边缘情况。在大多数情况下将不需要重写默认方法。但是，如果您确实需要修改的路径，我们建议您限制你修改令牌特定于你的虚拟路径提供程序中实现参数，，然后调用基实现，以执行正常路径处理和 ASP.NET

If you override the default implementation of the method, you are required to convert any special syntax with the parameter to a valid virtual path. You are responsible for syntax checking, path validation, and handling malformed input, as well as edge cases for well-formed input. In most cases it will not be necessary to override the default method. However, if you do need to modify the path, we recommend that you limit your implementation to modifying tokens specific to your virtual path provider in the parameter, and that you then call the base implementation to perform normal ASP.NET path processing

returns.span: 如果该目录存在于虚拟文件系统中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the directory exists in the virtual file system; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法，以指示该资源所表示的编译系统`virtualDir`存在于虚拟文件系统提供的这实例。Override the method to indicate to the compilation system that the resource represented by `virtualDir` exists in the virtual file system provided by this instance. 如果您的自定义类不支持目录，方法应返回`false`。If your custom class does not support directories, the method should return `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果您的虚拟文件系统将包含 Web 站点的主题 (通过创建一个虚拟`App_Themes`目录)，您的自定义类必须支持的目录。If your virtual file system will contain themes for the Web site (by creating a virtual `App_Themes` directory), your custom class must support directories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是实现中自定义方法类。The following code example is an implementation of the method in a custom class. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回的是节点后代类，该类包含的文件和目录中指定的目录中包含`virtualDir`参数。The method returns a descendent of the class that contains the file and directories contained in the directory specified in the `virtualDir` parameter. 如果您的自定义类不支持目录，方法应返回`null`。If your custom class does not support directories, the method should return `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果您的虚拟文件系统将包含 Web 站点的主题 (通过创建一个虚拟`App_Themes`目录)，您的自定义类必须支持的目录。If your virtual file system will contain themes for the Web site (by creating a virtual `App_Themes` directory), your custom class must support directories. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是实现中自定义方法类。The following code example is an implementation of the method in a custom class. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. span.span: Initializes the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 编译系统注册该提供程序后调用方法。The method is called after the provider is registered with the ASP.NET compilation system. 方法用于提供后所需的任何初始化实例放入应用程序所在的环境。The method is used to provide any initialization required after the instance is placed into the environment the application occupies. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是实现方法设置数据文件的路径，从应用程序的实例。The following code example is an implementation of the method that sets the path to a data file from the application's instance. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SamplePathProvider.cs#26)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SamplePathProvider.vb#26)]

summary.span: 通过阻止创建租约给予 对象无限的生存期。

span.span: Gives the object an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写中其基本类的方法。This method overrides the method in its base class. 它始终返回`null`，从而防止创建租约，可能会限制对象的生存期。It always returns `null` and thereby prevents a lease from being created that would limit the object's lifetime.

span.span: Returns a stream from a virtual file.

returns.span: 所指定虚拟文件或资源的只读 对象。

span.span: A read-only object for the specified virtual file or resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是使你能够从虚拟文件而无需创建获取流的便捷方法实例。The method is a convenience method that enables you to get a stream from a virtual file without creating a instance.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取对编译系统中以前注册的 对象的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to a previously registered object in the compilation system.

value.span: 编译系统中的下一个 对象。

span.span: The next object in the compilation system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当ASP.NET 编译系统注册对象，将其添加到提供程序链。When a object is registered with the ASP.NET compilation system, it is added to a chain of providers. 使用属性设置为处理转交给以前对象链中，如果请求的路径未提供此实例。Use the property to hand processing off to the previous object in the chain if the requested path is not provided by this instance. 路径提供程序链始终结尾的默认 ASP.NET 提供程序，它可将文件从文件系统。The chain of path providers always ends with the default ASP.NET provider, which serves files from the file system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例是的实现方法。The following code example is an implementation of the method. 如果请求的虚拟目录不会开始替换的字符串`"/vrdir"`，该方法使用属性将请求传递到下一个链中的对象。If the requested virtual directory does not begin with the string `"/vrdir"`, the method uses the property to pass the request to the next object in the chain. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/CS/SamplePathProvider.cs#23)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Hosting.VirtualPathProvider#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.hosting.virtualpathprovider/VB/SamplePathProvider.vb#23)]
